original_title: Trepsi - Nuny y Wicho - Arriba y Abajo
overview: Nuny and Wicho, like all friends from Trepsi, will find new melodies by flying up and down with Musi, discover how a caterpillar becomes a butterfly, buzz with funny bees, tie shoe laces with "Look I have tiny shoes" and have fun while singing many songs.
title: Trepsi - Nuny y Wicho - Up and Down
